comments.author: Dave
comments.body: There used to be a guy named Staffer? Stoffler? Stauffer? that rode with us once in a while. Haven't seen him since way back when... Some folks say he's moved his family up to the Yukon and they're living off the land. Others say he's living in an ashram somewhere in upstate Nepal. Anyone seen him?

comments.author: Greg
comments.body: I'm still here and psyched that the Frenz are looking into sponsoring a section of Sunshine Canyon that ends at Underwood Mountin, er, I mean, Bald Mountain Park. The Elusive One
